TopicTitle: So they've got Bill, Bob, Jebediah, as well Billy Bod and even Hansel Kerbal...

Articles.Content: ... why no Buzz Kerbal? Seems like an oversight to me.

I've had a Buzz Kerman before (although it was in .18). It might be the case that the name was removed from the list. I know this happened to "Neil" so it is possible that all the Apollo first names were removed as well.

You could always add a Buzz Kerman by editing your save file
I got him a couple of hours ago in a crew transport to minmus.
Personally I almost only get Merdrin Kerman, I think I have two or three of him in a station.
I'm chuffed I got a Kirk Kerman.
I miss Marbles... I used to cross my fingers hoping Marbles would be on the launch team and would cheer when his turn came up.
I'm always delighted when Gusdrin comes flies my ship.

I have Chuck Kerman on my moon base.

DEAL WITH IT .

And he appeared randomly on a "test flight"!

I didn't create him.
